title: OCE Pro games tonight - unwatchable....
body:
I tried to watch but it kept jumping around so much it was impossible to watch. Not sure if it was affecting everyone else but the quality of the stream was bad for me. (no internet issues)

I don't have that issue watching any of the NA or GPL games.

replies.body: Stream was fine for me. Youtube stream is also available.

I found on twitch it was particularly bad, so i changed over to the youtube live stream. If you want to watch the games, I've put the link below.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LnkfmQV7fyM
